#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int a[100005];
int main()
{
		int t=0,n;
		while(1)
		{
			t++;
			cin>>n;
			if(n==0)
				break;
			ll sum=0;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				cin>>a[i];
				sum+=a[i];
			}

			ll x=sum/n;
			ll ans=0;
			for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]<x)
					ans=ans+(x-a[i]);
			}


			cout<<"Set #"<<t<<"\n";
			cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<ans<<"."<<"\n\n";
		}

}
